title: Ticket #2951: [Debian] Symbol conflict when building on Debian for MIPS
description:
When building on Debian for MIPS, in sysapi, a local variable name is conflicting with a name defined by the compiler. Solution is to rename the local variable.

This was originally reported as Debian bug 669689: http://bugs.debian.org/669689
check_ins: 2012-Apr-23 12:00   Check-in [31796]: Fix build failure for Debian on MIPS. #2951 Rename local variable mips to mips_ to avoid conflict. Debian bug 669689 Committer: Jaime Frey (By Michael Hanke )
creator: jfrey
